outputs.output_descr: The objective of Project BRA/00/020 is to support the implementation of the environmental control and the introduction of innovative mechanisms of the management process through the execution of programmes and activities that express environmental and life quality gains in the following areas: different types of pollution, degradation and environmental risks, residues that affect health and environment, monitoring of the environment's quality, territorial organization, integrated management of the coast and maritime environments, regional integration and application of international agreements.

The objective of Project BRA/00/020 is to support the implementation of the environmental control and the introduction of innovative mechanisms of the management process through the execution of programmes and activities that express environmental and life quality gains in the following areas: different types of pollution, degradation and environmental risks, residues that affect health and environment, monitoring of the environment's quality, territorial organization, integrated management of the coast and maritime environments, regional integration and application of international agreements.

project_descr: Apoio às Políticas Públicas na Área de Gestão e Controle Ambiental - Sec. de Qualidade Amb. nos Assentamentos Humanos
